name: Thrust
description: A forward stabbing attack with the weapon. Faster than slash, with forward momentum.

windUp.description: Attacker draws weapon back, preparing to thrust forward

committed.description: Committed to the thrust, body weight moving forward

recovery.description: Pulling back from extended position, resetting stance

variablePower.description: Can use 50% less (1 stamina) for weaker/slower attack, or 50% more (3 stamina) for stronger/faster attack

telegraphs.description: Weight shifts to back foot, preparing for forward lunge
Shoulders pull back, weapon retracting for thrust
Weapon aligned with target, point forward
Full commitment, body leaning forward into thrust

damage.notes: In prototype: 1 clean hit = death, contributes 1 to the 3-hit death counter. Better against armored targets (future).
